attributes.action: send the Secretary of State for Culture on Cultural Sensitivity training
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The widely condemned sexist smearing of Shami Chakrabarti may be acceptable in Mr Burnham's culture but in most cultures (including Indian and traditional British) to be publicly accused by a Cabinet Minister of an illicit affair with a leading politician is deeply offensive. Mr Burnham clearly needs cultural sensitivity training - at the very least.
